# Catalogs Endpoints

Catalog registration, schema, table, column, and view management.

## `GET /catalogs`

List all registered catalogs

Returns a list of all registered catalogs.

- Operation ID: `listCatalogs`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | List of catalogs |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /catalogs`

Register a new catalog

Registers a new DuckLake catalog with the platform.

- Operation ID: `registerCatalog`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Catalog registered |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /catalogs/{catalogName}`

Get a catalog registration by name

Returns the registration details for a specific catalog.

- Operation ID: `getCatalogRegistration`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |

| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /catalogs/{catalogName}`

Delete a catalog registration

## `DELETE /catalogs/{catalogName}/schemas/{schemaName}`

Delete a schema

Permanently removes a schema from the catalog. Use the force parameter to delete schemas that still contain tables.

- Operation ID: `deleteSchema`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `force` | `boolean` | `false` | Force deletion even if the schema contains tables. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Schema deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /catalogs/{catalogName}/schemas/{schemaName}/tables/{tableName}/profile`

Runs profiling queries and stores statistics (row count, column count, size).

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |

| --- | --- |

## `POST /catalogs/{catalogName}/schemas/{schemaName}/volumes`

Create a volume in a schema

Creates a new volume. EXTERNAL volumes require a storage_location. MANAGED volumes auto-generate a storage location. Requires CREATE_VOLUME on catalog.

- Operation ID: `createVolume`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Volume created |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /catalogs/{catalogName}/set-default`

Set a catalog as the default

Sets the specified catalog as the default catalog for the platform.

- Operation ID: `setDefaultCatalog`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Catalog set as default |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
